snippets.name: DoItTrading Benefits Grid
snippets.code:
add_filter('the_content', 'doittrading_add_benefits_grid'); function doittrading_add_benefits_grid($content) { if (!is_product() || !has_term('expert-advisors', 'product_cat')) { return $content; } $benefits = '
💰 Start Earning While You Sleep

EA trades 24/5 automatically

⚡ Live Proven Strategy

Real results you can verify

🛡️ Capital Protected

Max 2% risk per trade

🎯 Setup in 5 Minutes

Pre-optimized settings

'; return $benefits . $content; }
